channel.title: What file do you change the starting items in?
channel.description: About a year or longer ago, I started coding on the devolution source as a pro. I then quit Moparscape and now have forgotten most things. I was just wondering if someone could remind me of what file I can edit the starting items. I can do it from there. :)

item.title: What file do you change the starting items in?
item.dc:creator: @maxmurks maxmurks
item.description:
@maxmurks wrote:

Oh, my bad I was thinking something else. :o
Well just open your Client.java and search "starter"
and change the additems Ids to what you want. Or just search for the Ids of some items that you start with.

Read full topic
item.source: What file do you change the starting items in?

item.title: What file do you change the starting items in?

@Epic_Coder wrote:

thats the equipted items - im talking about in the invent.

item.source: What file do you change the starting items in?

item.title: What file do you change the starting items in?
item.dc:creator: @maxmurks maxmurks
item.description:
@maxmurks wrote:

Hm well I’m not sure if that’s what your looking for or not. Mine looks something like this. -> playerEquipment[playerHat] = 1050; playerEquipment[playerCape] = 6570; playerEquipment[playerAmulet] = 6585; playerEquipment[playerChest] = 1033; playerEquipment[playerShield] = -1; playerEquipment[playerLegs] = 1035; playerEquipment[playerHands] = 2997; playerEquipment[playerFeet] = 15352; playerEquipment[playerRing] = -1; playerEquipment[playerArrows] = -1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = 415
Maby try searching a few more times and see what you come up with. XD

Read full topic
item.source: What file do you change the starting items in?

item.title: What file do you change the starting items in?
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Coder Epic_Coder
item.description:
@Epic_Coder wrote:

maxmurks:

Well for me it was in the Player.java but try just searching for playerEquipment in Client/Player and whatnot.

public int[] playerEquipment = new int[14];
public int[] playerEquipmentN = new int[14];

I thought I could remember how to edit - maybe not?

Read full topic

item.title: What file do you change the starting items in?
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Coder Epic_Coder
item.description:
@Epic_Coder wrote:

King Lingerz:

I imagine it’s either in class Player or client. Search for the item id’s of your starting gear in either one, you should find eventually.

Well its not player.java even thought thats what I thought it was and so have some others said.
